description: Virgo no Asmita is the Virgo Gold Saint in Lost Canvas. Asmita is blind, and says his eyes maintain closed and he can`t open them. Asmita has an introspective personality and practices Buddhism in the Sanctuary, something not accepted by Taurus Aldebaran. He does not consider Sasha as a good goddess as she is the sister of Alone and he has thought of betraying and killing her. His ideology remains unchanged until he encounters Pegasus Tenma in the Underworld and recognizes their strength.
name: Virgo no Asmita
